data.text:
@OntHospitalAssn Now that Directive #6 is revoked will you hire back all the amazing, hard working health care workers you have fired?! 
Will you offer a public apology and pay retro now that the science is clear the Vax doesn't work?!!?
@againstgovt1 @OntHospitalAssn It seems no matter how often they're wrong, lots of people seem to think their words are sacrosanct

@New_comer2018 @AnnieRinTO @OntHospitalAssn The last 7 days there have been 90 admissions.  The previous 7 days had 83.  Yes this in an increase but when I last did this unscientific count on Friday it was a decrease.  Maybe I will check the 7 day average, likely flatlining and we will see if it starts to rise like in U.K.
@OntHospitalAssn It used to be Covid patients now is COVID related……it’s always been a lie now they just change the wording
@AnnieRinTO @JustFac36465951 @OntHospitalAssn when 80+ year olds go to ICU for any reason, chances are they are going to die.

@ronnywalters123 @OntHospitalAssn They are going to double down with masks going away March 21st.  They'll say there will be entire classrooms in pediatric ICU and kids will be dying on the playground.
@AnnieRinTO @JustFac36465951 @OntHospitalAssn It is due to discharges being higher than admissions. Admissions are lower thsn a month ago, but have plateau in the last two weeks.
@OntHospitalAssn And yet schools have been back for 8 weeks. Where are the massive apologies on behalf of those who called schools germ spreaders?
@JustFac36465951 @OntHospitalAssn Is this due to deaths though?
@OntHospitalAssn Seems to me new adult admissions have been levelling, not decreasing…
